name: Banana Co.
description: Enter the world of Banana Co.—an abandoned company with a dark secret—and embark on a journey to unravel its secrets. As you traverse through the factory, notice the eerie little bananas scattered throughout and collect them to advance in the levels. Every room will tell a different story so examine carefully, but be forewarned about the dangers that lay ahead of you. Be prepared to lose sanity if you’re faced with utter darkness and always stay aware of your surroundings. IT will follow you…IT knows where you are…Can you decipher the unknown before it’s too late?
